title: Just in on the Riot News Network!
body:
http://i.ytimg.com/vi/YhV8wQ5Hwd0/maxresdefault.jpg

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Janna, fury of the storm here! Bringing you the latest news on Riot News Network! Today we are covering what is becoming known as, The Vote Wars. First let's get some insight from the player base.

http://img.memecdn.com/league-of-legends-problem_o_2369883.jpg

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Okay. . .moving on! Let's instead get some insight from Embertine. Now Embertine, in your own words could you describe The Vote Wars for us?

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/Lorana_zps6bvfd4yb.png Uh, well I don't know why you would call it that. I mean for the most part it's been pretty one sided.

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg So what you're saying is that the posters on the Memes & Games boards are making headway in the battle against salt on the boards?

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/Lorana_zps6bvfd4yb.png I don't know about that. We try and all, but we really just want to make people laugh. I mean if we can get even just a few people to smile or laugh, then it's been worth the effort.

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg It has been speculated that you and the other posters are actually farming upvotes to create a Weapon of Mass Upvotes, or WMU for short. Is it true that you all are making a Upvote Bomb, and if so exactly what will it do?

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/Lorana_zps6bvfd4yb.png No comment.

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Are you intending to use this Upvote Bomb against the salt on the boards, or on Riot itself?

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/Lorana_zps6bvfd4yb.png **NO COMMENT!**

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg  It seems we've lost connection with Embertine. Let's move on to our next guest, the person whom many believe to have started the Gif Wars that once rocked the Memes & Games boards, none other than Laughing fish himself!

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/Laughing%20Fish_zpslsaymnlb.gif 

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg I'm sorry could you repeat that? You don't seem to be coming in clearly?

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/Laughing%20Fish_zpslsaymnlb.gif

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Okay we'll have to come back to you later. Now let's go to my identical twin sister, (who is nowhere near as attractive as me) and see what's happening on the front!

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Thank you Janna! (and I heard that you know!) Right now I'm standing outside the military operations zone where the war is being raged! As you can see off in the distance, bombing raids continue against downvoter positions!

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/676/237/cbc.gif


http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg While mortar positions help protect friendly lines!

https://media.giphy.com/media/Nrd5yZDPhBbJC/giphy.gif

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg And even the navy has been called in to do long distance strikes!

http://i.imgur.com/7FW0zcT.gif

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg And night raids continue against the downvoters as well!

http://i.imgur.com/fDaVVal.gif

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg While Anti air fire continues none stop to protect our skies!

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/676/238/dfe.gif

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg However this is not to say that the downvoters haven't been fighting back!

http://img.pandawhale.com/48738-Bunker-Buster-downvote-gif-oNxc.gif

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Attacks continue against the wall daily!

http://giant.gfycat.com/ZanyUnnaturalBillygoat.gif

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg While bombings slip through air defenses and target the masses!

http://i.imgur.com/kdoNW.gif

http://i.imgur.com/vlz5zqy.gif

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Downvoters are fighting back on the streets with everything from pitchforks to assault rifles!

https://images.nonexiste.net/popular/wp-content/uploads/2012/10/First-attempt-at-a-downvote-gif-what-do-you-think.gif

http://i.imgur.com/goztEwR.gif

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Upvoters are also facing equipment failure as Riot cancels funding on several key weapons programs!

http://i.imgur.com/t7wrH8r.gif

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg All the while downvoters are coming up with new methods to deliver that potent downvote impact!

http://i.imgur.com/OiDVq.gif

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg And sniper fire picks off upvoters from a distance!

https://media.giphy.com/media/juWFsXQnStXVK/giphy.gif

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg I just received word that downvoters are assaulting the front lines!

https://media.giphy.com/media/vlpAp7O85PsbK/giphy.gif

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg As you can see this is truly a gruesome conflict! If only Riot would push more funding towards the upvoters it might bring an end to this conflict so much sooner. Now back to you Janna! (You bitch)

http://i1378.photobucket.com/albums/ah116/Daniel_Fritsch/maxresdefault_zps0abpb6op.jpg Thanks sis! (I'm gonna kick your ass in the next normals match!) In other news Skarner confirmed as the monster that kidnapped a little girl last week.

http://i.imgur.com/BZMs9cr.gif

replies.body: give me a tldr of this
tl;dr  Shit is going down and it is a massive conflict. Skarner has kidnapped a child.

> [{quoted}](name=Embertine,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=d4PJvtZq,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-10-04T22:47:47.652+0000)
>
> tl;dr  Shit is going down and it is a massive conflict. Skarner has kidnapped a child.

I don't know who you are. I don't know what you want. If you are looking for ransom I can tell you I don't have money, but what I do have are a very particular set of skills. Skills I have acquired over a very long career. Skills that make me a nightmare for people like you. If you let my daughter go now that'll be the end of it. I will not look for you, I will not pursue you, but if you don't, I will look for you, I will find you and I will kill you.

> [{quoted}](name=Myrddin,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=d4PJvtZq,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-04T23:14:22.707+0000)
>
> I don't know who you are. I don't know what you want. If you are looking for a shutdown, I can tell you I don't have gold, but what I do have are a very particular set of ~~skills~~ abilities. ~~Skills~~ Abilities I have acquired over a very long career. ~~Skills~~ Abilities that make me a nightmare for people like you. If you let my ~~daughter~~ support go now that'll be the end of it. I will not look for you, I will not pursue you, but if you don't, I will look for you, I will find you and I will kill you.

Fixed that for you.

{{champion:72}} "Good luck."

*2 days later*

{{champion:48}} THIS IS TROLL TOWN!
ha, you're funny, though there is one major flaw here- people dont actually help their supports.
{{champion:72}} Skar, Skar , Skarner!

I cannot begin to describe how truly beautiful this is. So I will just leave this:
http://cdn.crushable.com/files/2012/07/Shark-Finding-Nemo.gif

Emergency relief is on the way!

http://media.giphy.com/media/mVuHMzLyy0ef6/giphy.gif

Understood; Target locked!

http://media.giphy.com/media/lXRQ7suiL5TWg/giphy.gif
This is magnificent.

NOOO WERE LOSING.


Upvoters lets all join together and fight back against downvoters!

http://i.imgur.com/MHfvB.gif 

We come prepared.

Well done, xD

Getting fish to see this
http://comrom.co/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/Draco-Voldie-hug.gif
I'm so confused and impressed at the same time, it hurts.
The gifs are beautiful.
That doesn't look like the face of a Daniel
It is a avatar I chose because I like the look of it. I'm pretty sure no one's avatars look like themselves.
im dead at skarner
Aww look at the little Laughing Guppy :3
question, did you PhotoShop all of those downvotes and upvotes into those pictures. If you did how long did it take? But funny none the less.

Cannot afford photoshop. However Google is free! ;)

But it did take me around two hours to find the best ones, all the while watching Fear The Walking Dead marathon and Doctor who.

(EDIT) However I did crop and resize the avatar images. For that I used Gimp.
